Key Match Events: Jordan Ayew scored the winner for Ghana in the 90th minute from a rebound that sent Ghana's points accumulation to six in three matches.
Post-Match Reflections: The Black Stars have now moved to second on the Group I table and are in a good position to qualify for the 2026 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mali took the lead in injury time of the first half via a deflected shot from striker Kamory Doumbia.
Ghana got the equalizer shortly after the restart through a powerful header from Ernest Nuamah, who connected to a cross from Salis Samed.
